sect1.title: The Message Reader
sect1.para: &app; can read &vgap; messages via the message reader, a feature contributed by Sven Wergandt. You can start the message reader by selecting the Message reader option on the View menu, or by pressing Ctrl R.
The message reader can also show you the messages from past turns, by selecting the turn from the combobox on the top left, as you can see on .

The reader has two main panes, the left contains a tree list of message headers, categorized by message type, and the right pane contains the selected message text. On the left, some headers may be of a special color if the message is relevant to the player.
The top section contains the usual navigational controls, plus the mentioned combobox with the message history.
